Texts.Chs: 带一个^orange;斯肯遗物^reset;到位于^orange;科技前哨站^reset;的^green;X'i商店^reset;
Texts.Eng: Bring a ^orange;X'i Relic^reset; to the ^green;X'i Shop^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 这是真的吗？一个^green;Vexinarri Glaff^reset;？你在哪里找到它的？我还以为只是个传说呢！如我所承诺的，这是你的回报。我很荣幸。
Texts.Eng: Can it truly be? A ^green;Vexinarri Glaff^reset;? Where did you find this?!?! I thought these were only a legend! As promised, your reward. It has been a pleasure.

Texts.Chs: 我就是那种可以称之为收藏家的人。我们种族对我们的过去知之甚少，我把寻找更多有关我们种族历史线索的事业作为我的使命。如果你找到一个 ^orange;艾肯遗物^reset;，你能把它带回来给我吗？我会非常感激。
Texts.Eng: I am what you might call a collector, of sorts. My people have little knowledge of our past, and I make it my mission to find more information about our history. If you find a ^orange;X'i Relic^reset;, could you bring it back to me? I'd be ever so thankful.
